abstract.t: This document specifies a polyfill of QUIC version 1 that runs on top of bi-directional streams such as TLS. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this document takes place on the QUIC Working Group mailing list (quic@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/quic/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/kazuho/draft-kazuho-quic-quic-on-streams.
